vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
Delta.tokens_buy.tokens_buy (local variable @ patch_11.sol#19) shadows:
	- Delta.tokens_buy (function @ patch_11.sol#15-36)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
Delta.c should be constant (patch_11.sol#4)
Delta.owner should be constant (patch_11.sol#5)
Delta.owner2 should be constant (patch_11.sol#6)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_11.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (patch_11.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Delta.tokens_buy (patch_11.sol#15-36):
	-success = c.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transferFrom(address,address,uint256))),owner,msg.sender,tokens_buy) patch_11.sol#23

naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_amount' of Delta.withdraw (patch_11.sol#38) is not in mixedCase
